isPublic.label: Icumba ca bose
isPublic.description: Ivyumba vya bose birashobora gushakishwa n’abandi bakoresha .

allowGuestJoin.label: Reka abashitsi binjire
allowGuestJoin.description: Reka abakoresha batandikishijwe kwinjira mu cumba nk'umushyitsi

isEncrypted.label: Gushoboza kw'iherezo kugeza ku mpera
isEncrypted.description: Iyo bishobotse, ubutumwa bwo mu cumba buzoba bushizweko iherezo ry’iherezo .
isEncrypted.alert: Iherezo ry’iherezo ry’ibanga rirakoreshwa mu cumba, kandi iki kibanza ntigishobora kuzimwa.
